attributes.action: cancel the 2012 Olympics due to a total lack of interest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As very few people actually give a toss about the 2012 Olympics, that it is going to cost more than the Apollo Moon project, and the only people who will benefit from it are the snouts in the trough consultant lackeys and corporate payoligarchs of new labour, i submit that it should be cancelled, and money invested in a high speed rail network.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
